notes: If a single guest books a room whose minimum occupancy is 2 or more, apply the single_in_double_factor to the 'double' base price for that guest type.
If a room has min occupancy = 1 and a single stays, use 'single' base price.
If guest_count is between min and max, use the base tier matching guest_count (single/double/triple/quad).
If guest_count exceeds min occupancy and you allow it, add per-extra charges via 'extras.extra_bed' (or set 0 if not used).
